title: 怎么设置某世界和平
txt_content: 怎么设置某世界和平，指令时mv的

replies.author: xiangnian
replies.txt_content:
修改配置文件
只输入指令是不起作用的  过几下就会自动还原
修改配置文件的方法：将 difficulty: EASY这一栏的EASY改为peace
worlds:
  DIM1:
    ==: MVWorld
    hidden: 'false'
    alias: ''
    color: WHITE
    style: NORMAL
    pvp: 'true'
    scale: '16.0'
    respawnWorld: ''
    allowWeather: 'true'
    difficulty: EASY
    spawning:
      ==: MVSpawnSettings
      animals:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
      monsters:
        ==: MVSpawnSubSettings
        spawn: 'true'
        spawnrate: '-1'
        exceptions: []
    entryfee:
      ==: MVEntryFee
      amount: '0.0'
      currency: '-1'
    hunger: 'true'
    autoHeal: 'true'
    adjustSpawn: 'true'
    portalForm: ALL
    gameMode: SURVIVAL
    keepSpawnInMemory: 'true'
    spawnLocation:
      ==: MVSpawnLocation
      yaw: 0.0
      pitch: 0.0
      z: 0.0
      y: 67.0
      x: 0.0
    autoLoad: 'true'
    bedRespawn: 'true'
    worldBlacklist: []
    environment: THE_END
    seed: '5209402454866257363'
    generator: 'null'
    playerLimit: '-1'
    allowFlight: 'true'
